title: Degrees, Majors and Programs - Academics - Biola University
snippet: Biola offers over 250 undergraduate and graduate programs, offered on campus or online. Explore a variety of subjects and discover what you're meant to be!

title: Academics - Biola University
snippet: Learn about Biola's 43 majors and 42 minors, and find an undergrad degree program that aligns with your passion, supports your goals and equips you to engage the world.
